decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Block Plan, A4/17/5338/1, A4/17/5338/2, A4/17/5338/3, A4/17/5338/4, A4/17/5338/5, A4/17/5338/6, and A4/17/5338/7 received: 14/09/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Replacement of front window with door to form porch, and replacement of existing flat roofed front canopies with pitched roof canopies to the house.
